TopicTitle: FanWork Fridays: Kerbal Space Program - The Movie Poster

Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/301cb0bc17ca76a396dc75e2651dee4d/tumblr_inline_myi65rfNZE1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/5803e776a91fdfa1c6fc844ae5790eb1/tumblr_inline_myi677znbu1rr2wit.png"/></p>

<p>The final <strong>FanWorks Friday</strong> of 2013 belongs to forum user, <strong>SuperWeegee4000</strong>. <strong><em>Kerbal Space Program</em></strong> - The Movie? That’d be pretty cool. What do you think would be in it?</p>

<p></p>
This movie already exists:

This movie already exists:

[url = pootis-pootis-pootis-pootis-pootis.net]pootis

Ooh, fireworks!

I will make the movie with squad's permission

Please

This movie already exists:

Someone needs to take the echo function away from the uploader.

We all know it wouldn't end in any sort of good xD. We all know Apollo 13 or Gravity (which is awesome by the way). But it would be nice to have a comedy for kids about KSP. Animation wouldn't appeal to everyone, that's a fact.

Someone needs to take the echo function away from the uploader.

Yeah but it would be a great movie

This movie already exists:

Needs more struts.

I would totally watch a movie about KSP. I'm thinking a comedic version of Apollo 13.

In my best Don LaFontaine (AKA "Voice of God"):

In a World with no cities...

[view of Kerbin from space]

Where lives are worth less than a tank of liquid fuel...

[rocket exploding]

3 brave pilots dared to push the envelope...

[fade into Jeb, Bill & Bob, fade to IVA view at launch]

Dared to defeat gravity itself...

[fade to EVA outside of a capsule]

And changed history

[montage of complicated ships and space stations]

This November, you will be inspired by Jebediah, Bill and Bob, as they redefine what it means to be a hero.

[montage of the 3 palling around, looking up at the stars, and walking towards their rocket silhouetted against the sunset]

Edited January 6, 2014 by Soda Popinski
